name: BlockyJump
description:
Fullscreen recommended.

Control blocky fellow with a gun and try to not fall into water.
Your gun let you jump, but use it carefully, its very powerfull weapon!

Game Modes:
- Play Online - compete with real enemies, shot to them or push them into water.
- Survive Mode - how long can you survive on a blocky map. Watch out for purple guys, they don't like you.
